issue.title: Message header timestamps should be relative to the epoch

content.raw: Timestamps should be simulation time, not wall time. Using wall time would make no sense, because the simulation isn't guaranteed to run in real time. We're using the timestamps to synchronize simulated LIDAR and camera with the simulation.
content.html: Timestamps should be simulation time, not wall time. Using wall time would make no sense, because the simulation isn't guaranteed to run in real time. We're using the timestamps to synchronize simulated LIDAR and camera with the simulation.
